channel.title: Some Criticism
channel.description:
Ok, well i've added a few new minigames to my server and need some criticism on how they could be better or worse.
Ok, the main one is one that takes place in Buthorpe you talk to Saba he tells you if you bring him 20 of Dad's bones here will open a new shop for you. (He currently opens a shop with newbie items like Rune Scimatars, and Black platebodys). The new shop has some ddp's, full rune, etc.
How could I better that? ^.

item.title: Some Criticism
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

If you dont know how to change the item its in shops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Some Criticism
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Maybe add better items to the store? Or make the Dad in a maze or somewhere else.

Sorry if I didnt help haha

Read full topic
